players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie was found dead last night, so one of the remaining three of us is the mafioso. Bob hasn't said anything yet—Bob, do you have any thoughts?"
Diana: "I think we should be careful not to jump to conclusions too quickly. Bob's silence could mean he's thinking, or maybe he's unsure. Let's hear from Bob before deciding anything."
Bob: "Based on the evidence from last night, I believe Diana is the mafioso. I came to this conclusion after investigating her during the night."
Diana: "I find Bob's accusation very suspicious, especially since he was silent earlier but now quickly points the finger at me. If he's a detective, why reveal that so soon without solid proof?"

You: "Bob's claim to have investigated Diana is interesting, but he hasn't provided any proof or details. Diana's reaction seems genuine to me. We should consider all possibilities carefully before voting."

players.name: Bob

Alice: "Bob's claim to have investigated Diana is interesting, but he hasn't provided any proof or details. Diana's reaction seems genuine to me. We should consider all possibilities carefully before voting."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
